title: procedure for revaluation
content: Can someone give the procedure for revaluation  also that I cannot come to college for hod sign

comments.body:
Didn't they send you email regarding the reval procedure or announce in announcement section on pesu app?

You go to results > option to pay for review or reval will be available > select the courses > pay the fees > download the acknowledgement 

Form for reval and review both are attach to announcement in pesu app or in the email.

Download it> Print it > Print the acknowledgement > Fill in details

Submit the same to COE office in BE Block basement
i am not in blr is there any online procedure
You can pay the fee online but the form has to be submitted offline. Ask a friend to go submit it for you.
